name: The Zodiac Bistro
address: Greater Kailash 1, M Block Market, Delhi

reviews.name: Param Singh
reviews.msg: A decent small place. their kitchen is closed for renovation but still they are serving decent food. if you are at claridges you must try out their other restaurants.

reviews.name: Dylan
reviews.msg: The buffet has various options so I went for it. The interiors were classy and bright. The buffet was well arranged and seemed pretty inviting.

reviews.name: Dominique
reviews.msg: This place is a small little coffee shop at the claridges. I tried their buffet breakfast. The spread is a bit limited. It tried uttapam, idli, kachori, paneer parantha, toast along with coffee.

reviews.name: Dhruv
reviews.msg: Great menu choice for food and drinks, we chose the buffet option and weren't disappointed, the choices were amazing and well presented and topped up on a regular basis by kitchen staff.

reviews.name: Tushar
reviews.msg: Having lunch in jade as picwik was full they were courteous enough to serve some of my favs from pickwik in jade. But along with me the table next to me saw a mouse inside the restaurant and complained but the guy simply said ok ma'am. Atrocious
